title: Best of the Program | Guests: Tim Barton & Josh Hammer | 6/23/22
description:
As the Supreme Court is set to release the final decisions, Glenn and Stu review the remaining cases and discuss how the Biden administration will grab power illegally. Tim Barton joins to talk about the American Journey Experience and what's being taught. Opinion editor for Newsweek Josh Hammer joins to discuss the latest SCOTUS decisions, including the massive win for gun rights.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
